msItem.title: Perush ῾al Sifre ha-higayon shel Aristo פרוש על ספרי ההגיון של אריסטו

collation.p: 17 quires of mostly 15 leaves each, marked with signatures in the right-hand upper corner of the first pages of quires.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Italian semi-cursive script of the 16th century.

binding.p: Post-1600. Brown leather, with a title pasted on the front upper cover. Spine: 'Comm. On Aristotle. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2856.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: B. N. Rabinowitz: purchased from him by the British Museum on 18 April 1885: inscribed, folio [259v] (folio 002v).
